body_html:
I'm not sure it makes sense to allow both submitters AND users with role “Mentor” to view the dashboard as it wouldn't really solve our problem. wdyt?

I believe we only assign mentor roles when the team has been officially picked.

body:
> I'm not sure it makes sense to allow both submitters AND users with role “Mentor” to view the dashboard as it wouldn't really solve our problem. wdyt?

I believe we only assign mentor roles when the team has been officially picked.
